snippet.title: World of Tanks: Mercenaries | Core Breach Mode
snippet.description:
Suit up for explosive Mech deathmatches in Core Breach, a new event mode available for World of Tanks: Mercenaries from January 29 until February 4! Jump into the cockpit of a Mech, and shoot and smash your way to victory in epic 4 v 4 online multiplayer showdowns. Find out more: https://console.worldoftanks.com/news/core-breach

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WoTConsole/

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/wotconsole

Instagram: https://instagram.com/wotconsole

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WoTConsole

Let's battle! Download and play World of Tanks: Mercenaries for FREE on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Xbox 360!  https://console.worldoftanks.com/
